remarks: Subtract one prime's multiples from an unequal prime's.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.)
statement:
nzprmdif.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. Prime ) $.
nzprmdif.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Prime ) $.
nzprmdif.ne $e |- ( ph -> M =/= N ) $.
nzprmdif $p |- ( ph -> ( ( || " { M } ) \ ( || " { N } ) ) = ( ( || " { M } ) \ ( || " { ( M x. N ) } ) ) ) $.
